item.title: [INTPB-3026] As Marketing Manager I want the Chasback Program to be configurable by amount, subsidiary and channel so that I can have independent cashback programs
item.description:
We need to make the cashback program configurable. That means we need to have the ability to define different amounts per subsidiary and turn on/turn off cashback program for subsidiaries individually.

Acceptance Criteria:

  • Subsidiaries (PH/SG) can be turned on turned of individually (example PH can be switched of and SG turned on)
  • The amount for issuing Signup cashback can be defined individually in SG and PH
  • The amount for issuing Referral cashback (after 1st purchase) can be defined individually in SG and PH
  • the solution considers that in the future we will have different channels (such as user coming from mobile, marketing campaigns, desktop,..)
  • values for above configurations can be defined in a config/properties file (no hard coding of variables)
item.summary: As Marketing Manager I want the Chasback Program to be configurable by amount, subsidiary and channel so that I can have independent cashback programs

item.title: [INTPB-3084] As Marketing manager, I want to configure a link for mass customer sign-ups by subsidiary and amount so I can run individual promotions
item.description:
A ref link that can be shared, customer clicks on ref link and register for account.
e.g, "Click here (link) to sign up with hP and get X $ credited "

The Ui for this should be in Marketing-Campaigns Under the tab "Cashback Links" between Cashback Program and Reward platform.
There is a button "Create new Cashback Link" when clicking on it a lightbox opens asking for the following fields to be entered.

  • Subsidiary (mandatory)
  • Amount to be credited (mandatory)
  • Cap of number of redemptions (optional) to be build in 3449
  • Time period of ref link validity (optional) to be build in 3449

A button with "Create" and "Discard"
When clicking create we show: Are you sure you want to create a Cashback Link with the following configuration?" we show the whole configurations and the options yes and no. Successmessage: Cashback Link was successfully configured and created
Error message Cashback Link was not created

When clicking on Discard we show the message: Cashback Link was not created

The Configuration is then in created status we will handle the activating and status changing in a separate ticket.

Acceptance Criteria:

  • Should be customizable on the following fronts:
    • Amount to be credited. Pre-set amount to be credited per ref link.
    • Cap of number of redemptions to be build in 3449
    • Time period of ref link validity to be build in 3449
    • Subsidery
  • Should not stack with other promotions. e.g, sign up bonus. (User who received cashback a does not get cashback b)
  • charged to the same sys account as cashback program
  • there is an easy to use ui to configure the links
  • Only one link can be used per user
  • The link directs to the signup page
  • The link should be bellow 60 chars

This would be used for corporate partnerships or marketing initiatives
item.summary: As Marketing manager, I want to configure a link for mass customer sign-ups by subsidiary and amount so I can run individual promotions

item.title: [INTPB-3052] As a marketing manager I want to issue loyalty points instead of money to reward program clients so that they can use them to shop at the merchant
item.description:
In order to bypass the limit definitions and issue amounts of money freely to reward program clients we should issue loyalty points instead of invoicing money.
AC:

  • we top up the guest accounts with loyalty points instead of emoney
  • the amount can be defined individually per account and per country
  • we can issue loyalty points of different merchants
  • the loyalty points conversion to money is editable individually depends on the ratio merchant set for the loyalty points
  • limit definition does not apply to loyalty points ( we can charge as much as we want)
  • The processes is logged including amount issued per merchant/employee
item.summary: As a marketing manager I want to issue loyalty points instead of money to reward program clients so that they can use them to shop at the merchant

The loyalty points are issued by the merchants not helloPay. We can do this in two ways

Flow - 1

  1. Client buys loyalty points from Merchant
  2. Client enroll its customers for the merchant loyalty program
  3. Client sends the loyalty points to its customers

Flow -2

  1. Client buys loyalty points from Merchant offline ( managed by accounting offline)

item.title: [INTPB-3228] [Backend] As a risk agent I want to have an Account Dashboard so that I can find suspicious accounts faster
item.description:
This task is to redesign the risk details we currently show on admin UI so that risk agents get a better all round view on adminUI by using CYBS and TMX information we already store in the production DB.

The wire frames in the epic this story is related to depict how the overall solution should look like. This ticket focuses on the transaction table and the search that needs to be implemented.

  • The relevant pages in the wireframe are p.33-40

Acceptance Criteria:
Functional Requirements:

  • This ticket is to develop the Account Dashboard as displayed in the Wireframe it will be one of three Dashboards organised in a tab.
  • Result Table (some changes to wireframe)
    Country eMail Address Name Last Used Payment Instrument Last Used Payment Instrument Details Shipping Address Billing Address Item Type Wallet Status WalletID View Details
  • In the column Wallet Status we show the current status of the wallet but we provide the option to change the wallet status. When you click on the status a pop up opens (same as when changing the wallet status in the user details page) in which the status of the wallet can be changed
  • The result table shows all accounts that are matched with the search criteria entered
  • If no results are found we display the error message: "Sorry there are no accounts matching your search. Please try again" in the tab where we would otherwise show the result table
  • For every entry we show a button "Show User Details" in the "view details" column upon clicking on that button we open the respective user details page in a new page
  • For every transaction we also show a button "Show Txn History" in the "view details" column upon clicking on that button we show the transaction history of the user the same way we show it in the transaction details on the user details page, clicking on a transaction entry it links to the transaction page (same as when coming from user details)

Non-Functional Requirements:

  • When building this solution please keep in mind that we might move the Risk features from adminUI to a new RiskUI and potentially even to a new DB
  • This Account Dashboard is 1/3 dashboards that should be build into the risk view on adminUI
  • Reuse the current Risk Details Tab

Access Rights:

  • The access rights should be carried forward from Risk Details (Users Groups with Access to the "old" Risk Details Tab should have Access to this feature)
  • The access to managing wallet account status should be carried forward from the current access to wallet account status management (in user details page)

item.title: [INTPB-3235] [Backend] As compliance manager I want to ensure 4-eye principles when changing user level or wallet status so that such changes are double checked
item.description:
Following the process as used for invoices we need to implement 4-eye principle for changing user and wallet data.

A change to user and wallet data gets triggered by selecting "change" in user details next to User Lever and Wallet Status. The success message after selecting "submit" should be "Change request successfully created. The change is now pending for approval by another team member."

There should be a new tab in the dashboard: "Pending Changes to User Level/Wallet Status"

Clicking on Pending Changes to User Level/Wallet Status opens a new page: "Pending Changes to User Level/Wallet Status"
The page has the search fields in the following order:
Country (dropdown) , Creation Date (datepicker), Customer Email Address, Change Type Wallet Status or User Level -dropdown

The result table has the columns:

Created Server Time Customer Email Address Change Type Current Status New Status Country Creator Approve

In the Approve column we have the option "Yes" and "No"

  • Clicking on "Yes" Opens the confirmation window: "Are you sure you want to approve changing the #changetype of #customeremailaddress from #oldstatus to #newstatus?" "Yes" - "No"
    • (clicking on yes - successmessage: "#changetype for #customeremailaddress was successfully changed from #oldstatus to #newstatus" / clicking on no - message: "#changetype change for #customeremailaddress was not processed")
  • Clicking on "No" Opens the confirmation window: "Are you sure you want to reject the #changetype changes of #customeremailaddress?" "Yes" - "No"
    • (clicking on yes - successmessage: "Changing the #changetype for #customeremailaddress was rejected" / clicking on no - message: "Changing the #changetype for #customeremailaddress was not rejected")
  • Error message when creator of a refund tries to approve the same: The creator of a change request can not be the approver of the same. Please request approval of this refund by someone else.
  • In case there are more changes pending we show a notification message saying: "There are previous pending changes for this user which have to be handled first:" then we show the older pending change in the same notification box so that the user can approve/deny it faster and go back to the other request. The notification box should be easily closable with an x in the top right corner

Acceptance Criteria:
tbd

  • Change requests can be created by Super UI Admin, UI Admin,CS Team Lead, Risk Team Lead
  • Change requests can be approved by Super UI Admin, UI Admin,CS Team Lead, Risk Team Lead
  • Changes can not be approved by its creator
  • Be able to handle multiple change request to one user
  • We show appropriate error/success/confirmation messages as described above
item.summary: [Backend] As compliance manager I want to ensure 4-eye principles when changing user level or wallet status so that such changes are double checked
